HttpHandler
HttpHandler

A singleton class that receives and processes HttpRequest objects.  Runs GameHandler methods based on request method and endpoint.  Creates HttpResponse objects and passes them back to the socket.

Functions
handleGETRequest
HttpResponse handleGETRequest(
const std::shared_ptr<HttpRequest>& request
) const

Processes requests with GET method.

Parameters
request
const std::shared_ptr<HttpRequest>&

HttpRequest object for processing.

Returns

HttpResponse object with/without body and status code 200 or empty response with status code 400, based on if GameHandler method ended with success.

See Also

HttpRequest

) const

Processes requests with POST method.

Parameters
request
const std::shared_ptr<HttpRequest>&

HttpRequest object for processing.

Returns

HttpResponse object with status code 200 or 400, based on if GameHandler method ended with success.

) const

Processes requests with OPTIONS method.

Parameters

const std::shared_ptr<HttpRequest>&

HttpRequest object for processing.

Returns

HttpResponse object with Accept Headers.
